feature.label: OpenJMLFeature
feature.description: This plug-in encapsulates the OpenJML tool, which provides type-checking and static verification of JML constructs.
feature.copyright: The software is Copyright (c) 2007-2011 by David R. Cok
feature.license:
The software is licensed under the same license as OpenJDK, namely the GPL v.2.
The source code is available under sourceforge: https://sourceforge.net/projects/jmlspecs/
